name: ddf--gapminder--systema_globalis
description: The name is inspired by [Systema Naturae](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Systema_Naturae); the first systematic compilation of all living things from year 1735, by the Swedish Scientist Carl von Linn√©. The goal of Systema Globalis is to compile all public statistics; Social, Economic and Environmental; into a comparable total dataset.
